column5: Just became a member a couple of days ago, and wanted to say hello.  This is a great site! I've been able to find a tremendous amount of good, insightful information on lakes and lodges in Ontario, in just a few visits to the forum. Nothing beats reading about the experiences of those that have been there.  Looking forward to participating in the forum.  Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to all!  Pappylachia From east central Ohio
Welcome Pappylachia, hope you like it here and stay a while.
Welcome aboard. Looking forward to your input on things.
Welcome to the board.  I spent a year at Dennison, OH.  How close are you?
Welcome to OFC Pappylachia  You've made the right choice by joining, it's the best site on the planet Looking forward to your futur reports and best wishes for the holiday season to you to Leechman
Thanks for the welcome. I live just about 15 miles south of Dennison, in the Clendening lake area. Did you fish Clendening when you lived in the area?  Pappylachia
Welcome to the board...your right...it relly is a great place to hang out!   Look forward to your reports.    Limey
Pappylachia, we were practically neighbors.  To keep from boring others I'll shoot you a PM.
Welcome now never forget the camera
Not even sure why you bring a camera
Welcome Pappylachia! I was once married to a Hoosier, that practically makes us kin! I am glad to hear that you get up here fishing once in a while. Happy holidays! Jim
